title: Stairs to you
description: Archer "Dare" Andrews has a love of two things, classic cars and his best friend, Atlanta.He has always been on the sidelines of both until a beautiful blonde woman proposes an opportunity of a lifetime.Atlanta Reed is living a musician lifestyle from playing on Music Row, to touring the country. This small town girl lives a big city life, except when she in her apartment listening to old records. Tragedy strikes and lands Atlanta in a coma. With only a single flight of stairs between them. Will they find their way to each other?
author: Christy Dilg
